name: HotDIR
tagline: Colorized directory listing - Originally by Tony Overfield and Robert Woeger
body:
### HotDIR
A Windows command line utility to list files, in a directory, in color.

### Current Release
[HotDIR  0.5.0](https://github.com/veganaize/HotDIR/releases/tag/0.5)

### Authors and Contributors
@veganaize

### Support or Contact
This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
